text: Angelo Aniello Fiore (died c.1500, Naples) was an Italian architect and sculptor. He was a contemporary of Gabriele d'Agnolo and Giovanni Francesco Mormando. He was born in Naples and one of his pupils was Novello da San Lucano. Category:15th-century Italian architects Category:15th-century Italian sculptors Category:1500 deaths Category:15th-century Neapolitan people
title: Angelo Aniello Fiore
